alice.tuplecentre.core

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.tuplecentre.core.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputEvent, InternalEvent, OutputEvent

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents events of the tuple centre virtual machine An event is always related to the operation executed by some agent.
    Author:
    aricci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IId aid
      the entitiy executing the operation
      private TupleCentreId c
      the current tuple centre (VM) where this event is managed
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> ev_prop 
      private TupleCentreOperation operation
      the operation associated with this event
      private IId target
      represent the target entity that could be an agent or a TC
      private long time
      time at which this event occurs
